project.name: Encuestame
project.description: Encuestame is an open source project based on Java 6 technology. You can use to create different types of surveys. Encuestame provides a full featured Survey Managed System. It's integrated with the most popular social networks (Facebook, Twitter, etc) and the capable to distribute your content with diferent ways.

configuration.header:
<script type="text/javascript">

                              var _gaq = _gaq || [];
                              _gaq.push(['_setAccount', 'UA-2527438-15']);
                              _gaq.push(['_setDomainName', 'encuestame.org']);
                              _gaq.push(['_setAllowLinker', true]);
                              _gaq.push(['_trackPageview']);

                              (function() {
                                var ga = document.createElement('script'); ga.type = 'text/javascript'; ga.async = true;
                                ga.src = ('https:' == document.location.protocol ? 'https://ssl' : 'http://www') + '.google-analytics.com/ga.js';
                                var s = document.getElementsByTagName('script')[0]; s.parentNode.insertBefore(ga, s);
                              })();

                            </script>
